title: Miraloma / Sherwood Forrest Fully Detached 3Bed/1 Bath - PROGRESSIVE
map_address: Portola Drive near Del Sur Ave
app_fee: Credit Check and Processing fee of $40.00 for applications
posting_body: ['Miraloma / Sherwood Forrest Fully Detached 3Bed/1 Bath Single Family Home – PROGRESSIVE', 'Property Address', '1017 Portola Drive | San Francisco, CA 94127', 'Available: 08/03/2022', 'Offered By', 'Progressive Property Group, Inc.', 'Description', 'Welcome to 1017 Portola Drive!', 'This lovely, classic, fully detached Marina style home offers 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom all located on the same floor.', ' The house is freshly painted, recently remodeled with beautiful period details throughout.', 'Centrally located, with easy access to freeways, and public transportation at your front door.', 'West Portal and shops and dining around the corner as well as Mollies Stone’s market.', "Gorgeous wood floors throughout and lots of charm in this 1920's Marina Style home.", 'Main level foyer leads to a spacious living room with decorative fireplace, barrel ceilings, and large, floor to ceiling windows.', 'Living room opens to a formal dining room.', 'Large, eat in kitchen with ample cabinet and counter space.', 'New gas stove, hood and dishwasher as well as refrigerator.', 'Two very good-sized bedrooms are overlooking the back yard.', ' One of the bedrooms with direct backyard access through sliding doors.', '3rd bedroom on this main floor is also good in size.', 'Full size, recently remodeled bathroom on this main floor with shower over tub.', 'OTHER FEATURES:', 'Washer and dryer in garage.', 'Tons of storage.', '2 car tandem garage parking plus driveway', 'Tenant pays all utilities', 'SimpliSafe security system ready at tenant’s expense', 'LEASE TERMS:', 'Landscape maintenance by owner on as needed basis', 'No pets but we do comply with all applicable laws', 'Rent: $4750', 'Security Deposit: 1.5 times rent', 'Available for move in', '12 month minimum lease', 'No smoking', 'ADDRESS: 1017 Portola Drive @ Del Sur Avenue', 'For additional information and to schedule a viewing please reply to this ad or call / text', 'show contact info', 'CA BRE License # 01905856', 'Progressive Property Group', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 3BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $4,750.00', 'Available: 08/03/2022', 'Application Fee: $40.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
